column4: Ubuntu Classic is GNOME2. You can get 3 from a PPA but it's pretty unstable and will most likely break.
I tried the gnome3 team ppa and it hosed my system, actually had to reinstall...first time I've ever had an unfixable problem in linux :P
but Unity is broken, I launch stuff and the windows pop up behind other things
It broke my GNOME and Unity disappeared. I use PPA-purge to revert to 2
